website_summaries.verdict: Capable compact projector whose laser light engine produces a crisp HD image in dark and light rooms.
pros: Proprietary 9-element lens for exceptional image clarity and edge-to-edge focus
Has fast 802.121ac WiFi for reliable, uninterrupted wireless streaming
cons: Definitely an expensive option compared to others, but performs well to justify the price

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the projector itself, very stylish. But the quality was not what I was expecting for that price, Epson makes less expensive projectors that blow this one out of the water.. so you are seriously paying just for the design.
customer_reviews.author: RasecMunir

customer_reviews.title: One of the best tech purchases in years!
customer_reviews.text: Easily one of the most rewarding tech purchases over the last few years. Beautiful picture, love the smart tv features, and bright enough for outdoor socially distanced neighborhood movies... like an entire two-car garage door.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Ogne

customer_reviews.title: Summer outdoor screening
customer_reviews.text: This is simply a great product. Picture quality, up to 100 in, is fabulous. When teamed with a decent Bluetooth speaker A2DP compliant you are ready for out door summer screening.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Great projector with some limitations
customer_reviews.text: Review for EF-12 Pros: - It's laser, so it will last 20000 hours, which is around 10 years with normal usage. - It doesn't heat up as much as bulb projectors and its fan is less noisy. - It's 3LCD so no rainbow effect, there is minor screendoor effect. - It has accurate autofocus and cornerstone adjustments. - It's very small and lightweight, it is very portable. - Very good internal speakers. Cons: - Limited contrast - No optical zoom - No optical lens-shift - Limited lumens - Not 4K Overall a game changer in this price range with some limitations.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I setup the projector for outside use. Great for social distance for friends and family. Not great for daytime watching
customer_reviews.author: Tom G.

customer_reviews.title: For the price, buy another projector.
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect example of a good idea that is poorly implemented. In order to use the remote with this projector, you must use the included android TV stick. If you don't use the stick (and just connect via HDMI to another device) the remote that comes with the projector is useless. You can't use it to do anything except turn it on/off. The picture is OK but nothing special. If you are ok with using the projector for video and audio, its not bad...but who wants to listen to audio from this device?
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Filter keeps clogging/overheating
customer_reviews.text: The picture quality on this is exceptional. The smart tv options are very cool. Sound is adequate. The big issue is that the fan/filter/intake keeps clogging and the unit overheating. I do live in an older apartment but it's weird it hasn't happened with any of the 4 other epson units I've used. When the picture is working though its great. Clear and precise and the unit seems to run cooler. Maybe the cpu for android tv is running hot? Maybe something is up with my units thermometer. Either way slightly disappointing. Everything else checks out in terms of digital inputs and bluetooth and ease of use and projecting so that it looks good from below or really any angle.
customer_reviews.author: A. Reader

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant brightness and clarity, very small footprint, and connects via HDMI.
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant brightness and clarity, very small footprint, and connects via HDMI to Apple TV+, Netflix, and more. Out of the box I was extremely impressed with the form factor of this Epson Projector. It's very small, compared to other standard sized projectors. I easily hooked it up to my MacBook Pro 2020 M1 via a USB C to HDMI connector. Once plugged in to the Mac, I chose to MIRROR DISPLAYS in System Preferences. For sound, you set OUTPUT to EPSON PJ, type HDMI. Very easy. I projected the image onto a screen, hung on the wall. Underneath there is a place to screw in a support, but it is smaller than that which supports a standard tripod mounting screw.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Garfield

customer_reviews.title: Good projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector is very good, the laser light is extremely bright and we have no problem using it with the lights on. We were pleased with the performance, fast motion wasn't choppy and the colors were all rich. We set it up as a 150" screen, so it can go quite large. And Epson is a good brand, they are very popular and have a good reputation. It worked without a problem. It was a big increase in quality from our last one. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: B. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Winner Winner!
customer_reviews.text: First, a minor complaint that other reviewers have pointed out, no Netflix! That's really my only complaint. If they add that, this projector would be absolutely perfect. The Yamaha sound is fantastic for the size. If you have it up against a wall, it will deflect wonderfully and sound even larger. The picture quality is top notch. I'm a believer in laser projectors now. The only thing that would make it better would be if it was 4K, but the price would double!
customer_reviews.author: HEYOOO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and so easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector! The picture is so bright and clear. The projector is small and portable so you can set it up just about anywhere (with electricity). You can even use it to play movies on your ceiling. The projector comes with a "quick start" guide and is so easy to set up. The physical set-up is extremely simple as the instructions have illustrations along with the written directions. Once you get the projector powered up you just follow the on-screen directions. You can start streaming movies in about 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: samiam

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! It was very easy to set up. I like the built in google TV, I can watch Hulu, youtube, and HBO max. It also has a built in speaker, perfect for a home theater. The projector adjusts its picture to match the wall it is screening at (this feature is amazing!). The picture quality is incredible! All in all, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Little Projector!
customer_reviews.text: I love this projector! It's so awesome. Really great picture quality for its size (and cost), easy connectivity, attractive design. And man, this this is SMALL. I mean very small. Look at those dimensions! Makes it crazy portable. You can toss this in a bag and bring it wherever, then easily set up a movie on the fly. Not to mention that it has surprising good built-in speakers, making this projector really all you need for a great on-the-go viewing experience. And just as a tiny little perk, I love the way the cords tuck in for storage! Makes it just that much more compact.
customer_reviews.author: Dipped in Ink

product_meta.title: Epson EF-100 Smart Streaming Laser Projector with Android TV - Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Epson EF-100 represents a new type of 3-chip laser projection technology designed for today’s content streamers. Based on unique Epson MicroLaser Array Technology, this projector is not only elegantly compact, but capable of producing an incredibly bright and colorful image up to 150" on virtually any wall or dedicated screen. Powered by Google’s Android TV, the moment you power-on the EF-100, you’re ready to use all your favorite streaming apps such as Netflix, YouTube, HBO NOW, Hulu, WatchESPN and more (1). The world’s smallest 3LCD, true laser-based projector (2), the EF-100 represents a new type of streaming experience and a significant technical achievement in mini-laser digital projection. Stream big. Stream anywhere (3). 1. Based on 3LCD laser projectors with 500 lumens or more in brightness. Per Futuresource Consulting, May 2019. 2. Color brightness (color light output) and white brightness (white light output) will vary depending on usage conditions. Color light output measured in accordance with IDMS 15. 4; white light output measured in accordance with ISO 21118. 3. Based on true laser-diode projectors priced or less, as of May 2019. 4. In order to use the Android TV, the Epson EF-100 projector must be configured on a network via a wireless connection. EPSON is a registered trademark, EPSON Exceed Your Vision is a registered logomark and Better Products for a Better Future is a trademark of Seiko Epson Corporation. All other product names are trademarks and/or registered trademarks of their respective companies. Epson disclaims any and all rights in these marks. Copyright 2019 Epson America, Products features and specifications are subject to change.
feature_bullets: STUNNING PICTURE QUALITY – Imagine an incredibly bright and colorful projected image up to 150 inches on virtually any wall or dedicated screen – even when the lights are on (2).

ELEGANT COMPACT DESIGN – Designed with simplicity in mind, the Epson EF-100 has a clean, compact, and modern design available in white and silver, or black and copper to beautifully fit within any décor.
EPSON CINEMA LENS – Epson Cinema Lenses utilize a proprietary 9-element lens structure – including seven glass spherical elements for exceptional image clarity and edge-to-edge focus uniformity.

AUTO PICTURE SKEW CORRECTION – Depending upon how you orient the Epson EF-100 to the wall, the projector will analyze the projected image and correct the vertical geometry of the picture for a beautiful viewing experience.
AWARD-WINNING SERVICE & SUPPORT – Standard 2-year usually next-business-day, full-unit replacement limited , along with free technical phone support for the life of the product.

INCLUDED ANDROID TV – Built-in Android TV with a simple-to-use remote – including voice search with built-in Google Assistant. Watch all your favorite streaming channels including Netflix, HBO, YouTube, hulu, ESPN and more. Even stream live TV with apps like YouTube TV.

INTEGRATED AUDIO SYSTEM – Internal high-quality bass-reflex speaker for an impressive audio performance. Additionally, the EF-100 includes a standard 3. 5mm stereo output connection with preset tone controls.

EPSON MICROLASER ARRAY PROJECTION TECHNOLOGY – Unique multi-array laser diode technology to produce an exceptional level of brightness while significantly enhancing the black density. The result is an exceptionally bright and clear image – far beyond most projectors in this class (1, 3)

TRUE 3-CHIP PROJECTOR DESIGN – Advanced 3LCD technology displays 100% of the RGB color signal for every frame. This allows for outstanding color accuracy while maintaining excellent brightness, without any “rainbowing” or “color brightness” issues seen with other projection technologies.

OUTSTANDING BRIGHTNESS (2) – Capable of displaying high-definition content at an exceptional 2, 000 lumens of brightness for both color and white content. This not only provides for an exceptional viewing experience but sets a new standard in this class of projection. (1, 3)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars53 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
